short_summary: Remotely Piloted Aircraft System – Ground Control Centre
description: Remotely Piloted Aircraft System – Ground Control Centre, Ottawa, Ontario
full_summary:
**Title**
Remotely Piloted Aircraft System – Ground Control Centre

**Notice Number**
MX-22677608667

**Tender Closing Date**
April 4, 2023, 2:00 PM ET

**Solicitation Number**
NR19RPAS_74124

**Brief Description**
The Government of Canada has released a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the design and construction of a Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) - Ground Control Centre in Ottawa, Ontario. The project involves the construction of a new facility to support the RPAS operations.

**Key Details**

* **Security Requirements**: The project requires the implementation of security measures to prevent unauthorized access to sensitive areas.
* **Estimated Construction Cost**: The estimated construction cost is approximately $65,000,000.
* **Submission Method**: Proposals must be submitted electronically through the MERX system.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical qualifications of the proposer
* Past experience in design and construction projects
* Quality of the proposed solution
* Price and payment terms

**Zones of Opportunity**
The project will be executed in the Ottawa, Ontario area.

**Trade Agreements**
The project is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact:
Andrew Webster, Procurement Officer
Defence Construction Canada
Phone: (613) 949-7930
Email: [andrew.webster@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.webster@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

**Official Documents**
The full tender notice, including the Request for Proposal, technical documents, and terms and conditions, are available on the MERX system. Fees may apply; please consult the MERX pricing page for more information. 

Note: There is no need for any longer descriptions as this type of documents are usually bullet-pointed with very detailed information. Please keep it concise and use a table for additives information (e.g trade agreements). Also - the standard format for this type of document is BIDS, RFP, RFQ.
